name: mariomka/disposable-email-detector
description: A PHP package to detect disposable emails based on ivolo/disposable-email-domains list.

scripts.update-domain-list: wget https://github.com/ivolo/disposable-email-domains/archive/master.zip -O disposable-email-domains.zip && unzip -jo disposable-email-domains.zip disposable-email-domains-master/index.json && mv index.json domain-list.json && rm disposable-email-domains.zip
